channel.title: Java help please :D
channel.description:
hello.. when i compile i get this error
[code]javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press Return key to continue: [/code]
can i get some help with it?
i use this code for compiling and it works with all my other sources and clients... and im running ubuntu 10.4
[code] @echo off "/home/myname/.wine/dosdevices/c:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_21/bin/javac.exe" *.java -cp .;./lib/sbbi-upnplib-1.0.4.jar;./lib/jxta.jar pause [/code]

item.title: Java help please :D
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:3, topic:355552”]There are no java files in the same directory of the compiler.[/quote]This.

You cannot use a normal compiler for what you are doing. You need to change your compiler so that it find your main server file.

Read full topic

His java path is fine…

item.title: Java help please :D
item.dc:creator: @john55223 john55223
item.description:
@john55223 wrote:

ok, first go to your start menu>computer>your hard drive>program files>java then look at what it says, go to your compiler then rightclick>edit then make sure the java path is the same as the version of java in you computer
here is mine if you can give rep becuase douchebags took it off becuase i didnt explain something 1021489249%

anlh8p.jpg1280×800

if dont work

Read full topic

item.title: Java help please :D
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

hello… when i compile i get this error

javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press Return key to continue:

can i get some help with it?

i use this code for compiling and it works with all my other sources and clients… and im running ubuntu 10.4

@echo off
"/home/myname/.wine/dosdevices/c:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_21/bin/javac.exe" *.java -cp .;./lib/sbbi-upnplib-1.0.4.jar;./lib/jxta.jar
pause

Read full topic
